casebody.data:
NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, LLC, d/b/a Champion Mortgage Company, a foreign corporation, Appellant,
v.
KAL-MOR-USA, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; and Canyon Willow Owners' Association, a Nevada non-profit corporation, Respondents. No. 70007 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 18, 2018

AFFIRMED.
